definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create

sentences.english: The child looks to his mother to cure his hurts.
sentences.chinese: 孩子希望媽媽能治癒他的創痛。

sentences.english: Memories of traumatic or enraging events can also trigger angry feelings.
sentences.chinese: 創痛的記憶，或使人憤怒的事件也會引發憤怒情緒。

sentences.english: The trauma of war makes peace all the more precious.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭的創痛，讓人們倍感和平的可貴。

sentences.english: Some of the battles caused Athena to wind up physically beaten.
sentences.chinese: 有些爭鬥以雅典娜肉體上的創痛而結束。

sentences.english: And of course, in the real economy, the pain continues.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對實體經濟而言，創痛在繼續。

sentences.english: I do not know the tremendous pain that can stimulate China's intellectuals?
sentences.chinese: 不知道這巨大的創痛，能否刺激中國的知識分子？
